Richmond.Bayview-Montalvin, California:
Bayview-Montalvin is a former census-designated place (CDP) in Contra Costa County, California, United States. The population was 5,004 at the 2000 census.
Prior to the 2010 census, the CDP was dissolved into Bayview CDP and Montalvin Manor CDP.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, the CDP has a total area of 0.8 square miles (2.1 km2), of which, 0.6 square miles (1.6 km2) of it is land and 0.2 square miles (0.52 km2) of it (23.17%) is water.
